channel.title: This faggot
channel.description:
Alright, there's this kid. He's like best friends with my ex-girlfriend. Me and her have been staying friends, but this kid keeps making up fake stories about shit I say to him that's really mean, stuff I'd never do. And my ex believes him over me because she's a fucking fake and emotional whore, and him and his little band of ruff riders is gonna come all after me tomorrow. Now I'm extremely weak and scrawny but this kid and his "friends" are like weaker than I am.
tl;dr: faggot threatens me what do

item.title: This faggot
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:67, topic:387731”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=483526.msg3543465#msg3543465 date=1301017456]

bring a switch knife with you.

That’s not cool.
[/quote]It’s what he deserves for being such a retard.

Knives do more harm than good. You may want to hurt the person but you never think of the repurcussions (not you personally), a mother without her baby etc, a baby without their father etc.[/quote]
May I introduce you to something that is good then?

GOOD:
[ul][li]Keeps me away from fights (as i do this and they typically think “oh shi, he knows how to use it”)[/li]
[li]Keeps me outta trouble (no fights = no trouble)[/li]
[li]Keeps me occupied and outta drugs (bonus++ * 2?)[/li]
[li]Keeps my sperm count high from lack of drugs (another bonus++?)[/li]
[li]Makes driving a motorcycle seem safer (as I have almost been mugged 2 times on my bike, until I get out the knife and whip it open)[/li][/ul]

BAD:
[ul][li]Cuts up my fingers if I screw up.[/li]
[li]Friends try to figure it out and endup injuring themselves (cut fingers, hole in wall, etc)[/li]
[li]Can be dangerous without practice?[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
